summary: This is an email chain from July 22, 2020, discussing the availability of video from a press briefing held by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and the FBI regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email references videos from NBC News and CBS containing the full remarks of Audrey Strauss and Bill Sweeney.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.role: U.S. Attorney (Acting) for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Mentioned as having given remarks at a press briefing regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email seeks video of her full remarks.

persons.name: Bill Sweeney
persons.role: Assistant Director in Charge of the FBI's New York Field Office
persons.context: Mentioned as having given remarks at a press briefing regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email seeks video of his full remarks.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the arrest which prompted the press briefing by the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI.

connections.description: Both gave remarks at the same U.S. Attorney's Office and FBI press briefing regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.
Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, was involved in the legal proceedings and public announcement regarding Maxwell's arrest.
Sweeney, as FBI Assistant Director, was involved in the law enforcement action and public announcement regarding Maxwell's arrest.

events.title: Press Briefing on Ghislaine Maxwell Arrest
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and the FBI held a press briefing regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. Audrey Strauss and Bill Sweeney gave remarks.

events.title: Email Discussion of Press Briefing Video
events.description: An email exchange within the U.S. Attorney's Office discusses locating video of the full press briefing remarks, referencing NBC News and CBS videos.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY (Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 22, 2020, discussing the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.
It references a press briefing held by the U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) and the FBI, featuring remarks from Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss and FBI Assistant Director Bill Sweeney.
The email's purpose is to locate and upload the full video of the press briefing to the office's YouTube channel, noting that NBC News and CBS had video available.
